alert.note: Alert for Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 20 at 11:56AM CDT until July 20 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central Kansas, southwest Kansas and west central Kansas, including the following counties, in south central Kansas, Barber, Comanche, Edwards and Kiowa. In southwest Kansas, Clark, Ford, Gray, Haskell, Hodgeman, Meade, Seward and Stevens. In west central Kansas, Ness and Trego. * WHEN...From 3 PM CDT this afternoon through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
